rotate module¶

Matrix rotation to move +z to some arbitrary vector. Only placed here to avoid circular imports.

rotate.rot_to_b(B, param)¶

Rotate param so that axis 2 (Z) points in direction of B

IN:
B: np.array(3)

(x,y,z) coords of vector

param: np.array(n,n,n)

3D array to rotate.
